title: 10 personal finance rules to follow if you are taking a sabbatical from work - Economic Times
content: 10 personal finance rules to follow if you are taking a sabbatical from work  Economic Times
description: First, define the break as firmly as you can.  Why you need the time off in the first place will determine that. If you plan to study for a competitive exam and cannot do it along with a full time job, give yourself a set number of attempts to make it.
